title: pyGSK: Generalized Spectral Kurtosis Toolkit
description: pyGSK is a modular, open-source Python toolkit for computing and visualizing the Generalized Spectral Kurtosis (SK) estimator. Built upon the theoretical framework introduced in Nita & Gary (2010, MNRAS Letters 406, L60â€“L64) and the renormalization logic from Nita & Hellbourg (2020, IEEE RFI2020), pyGSK provides thresholding, cross-correlation diagnostics, and pedagogical plotting for signal detection in spectral data.
